attributes.action: Call a General Election on 14th/15th October 2019
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is therefore stop the incessant delay and I urge all who are in favour of a election to resolve Brexit once and for all .

The current Parliament requires legitimacy and a future Government needs a strong mandate to finally break the deadlock which has held the United Kingdom back these past three-years. 

So let democracy do what it does best and demand that  Members of Parliament to do what is right for the country and give us the right to finally determine our future!
attributes.background:
The only way to stop the Brexit impasse is to call a general election and end the divisiveness.

There is now a clear divide amongst the political parties on both sides of the Brexit spectrum and it is is clear what each political party will deliver whether you're in the Leave or Remain Camp.
